results.deck: CROSS†CHANNEL is a Japanese visual novel about people who cannot fit into society.
results.name: CROSS†CHANNEL

results.deck: A racing game being developed by Activision, release date 11.16.2010.
results.name: Death Drive

results.deck: The tie-in videogame to the 2011 Green Lantern movie. This brawler depicts a clash between the Green Lantern Corps. and their predecessors as guardians of the universe, evil robots known as the Manhunters.
results.name: Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters

results.deck: The two leaders in the fighting game genre collide in this ultimate tag-team mash-up. Will you cross the line?
results.name: Street Fighter X Tekken

results.deck: Tekken X Street Fighter is/was one of the two crossover fighting games featuring notable Street Fighter and Tekken characters. This upcoming Namco-developed entry will utilize a 3D playing field featured in the Tekken franchise. Development has been troubled since its announcement.
results.name: Tekken X Street Fighter

results.deck: A bizarre, forgettable series of plot devices conspire to bring together the main characters of the most popular animated programs made by Nicktoons circa 2006.
results.name: Nicktoons: Battle for Volcano Island

results.deck: The Super Hero Squad team up to stop the evil Dr. Doom from retrieving all of the Infinity Stones. Coming to Wii, DS, PS3 and Xbox 360 from THQ.
results.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet

results.deck: A PS3 racing game by Eutechnyx.
results.name: Supercar Challenge

results.deck: Based on the novel and movie of the same name, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 will provide a conclusion to the series as it is not only the second and last Deathly Hallows game, but also the last main Harry Potter game.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

results.deck: Karaoke game featuring the songs and videos from most popular Disney films.
results.name: Disney Sing It: Family Hits

results.deck: A game centered around user-based design and creation, crafted by EA Bright Light.
results.name: Create

results.deck: The third game in the Operation Flashpoint series. Operation FlashPoint: Red River will focus on co-op gameplay.
results.name: Operation Flashpoint: Red River

results.deck: Help Dora find her way home in time for her birthday party.
results.name: Dora's Big Birthday Adventure

results.deck: The sequel to the 2009 racer Need for Speed: Shift. Shift 2 features improved graphics, a new campaign mode and the addition of the Autolog system as featured in Need For Speed: Hot Pursuit.
results.name: SHIFT 2: Unleashed

results.deck: The thirteenth title in the Tales franchise for PlayStation 3.
results.name: Tales of Xillia

results.deck: The latest console iteration of the Ace Combat franchise, and a reboot of the series, Assault Horizon adds flyable helicopters, destructible environments, and a new cinematic pursuit system called "Close Range Assault".
results.name: Ace Combat Assault Horizon

results.deck: A new arcade racer from the developers at Candella Software.
results.name: Cargasm

results.deck: A downloadable turn-based RPG by Double Fine. Play as a child on Halloween night in search of your twin sibling.
results.name: Costume Quest

results.deck: Cabela's North American Adventures gives players the opportunity to experience hunting in more than 20 locations across the continent.
results.name: Cabela's North American Adventures

results.deck: Featuring full motion controls, players will be able to cast, reel, jig, set the hook and more as if they had an actual fishing rod in their hands.
results.name: Rapala Pro Bass Fishing

results.deck: The third game in the BioShock series leaves the bottom of the sea behind for an entirely new setting - the floating city of Columbia, circa 1912. Come to retrieve a girl named Elizabeth, ex-detective Booker DeWitt finds more in store for him there than he could ever imagine.
results.name: BioShock Infinite

results.deck: The planned sequel to S.T.A.L.K.E.R. The game would have used a new multi-platform engine. It was officially cancelled on April 25th, 2012.
results.name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2

results.deck: The Ratchet franchise returns to multiplayer action. Play as Ratchet, Clank, Captain Qwark, and Dr. Nefarious in the series' first co-op-focused title.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank: All 4 One

results.deck: Top Gun is an air combat shooter that lets you take control of the pilot Maverick as he goes from the Top Gun Academy to dog fights over the Indian Ocean.
results.name: Top Gun

results.deck: The first game developed by Atlus for the PS3/Xbox 360. Made by the Persona Team, The game is an "adult oriented" action-adventure/horror game with puzzle platforming stages.
results.name: Catherine

results.deck: The latest game in Sega's Virtua Tennis series adds a new World Tour, online rank progression, and optional motion play.
results.name: Virtua Tennis 4

results.deck: This is based on DreamWorks Animation's film Megamind.
results.name: Megamind: Ultimate Showdown

results.deck: Get Fit With Mel B includes six types of aerobics disciplines with more than 100 tailored exercises.
results.name: Get Fit With Mel B

results.deck: It is the seventh title in the Memories Off visual novel series.
results.name: Memories Off: Yubikiri no Kioku

results.deck: Possession is a survival horror game inspired by classic zombie movies. You play as the "Enslaver," a former-human who can take command of all zombies.
results.name: Possession

results.deck: Track down the re-incarnated souls of history's most evil people in your capacity as an agent for a shadowy organization of dubious intent.
results.name: Incarnate

results.deck: For the first time in Synetic's Crash Time series, players can experience and partake in challenges online. Crash Time returns with a host of new features in "Crash Time 4: The Syndicate".
results.name: Crash Time 4: The Syndicate

results.deck: Take control of big game hunter Cole Rainsford and bag some possessed murderous animals, in this 2010 installment of the first-person hunting series.
results.name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2011

results.deck: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Defenders of the Core brings gamers into a fast binding action adventure to save the Earth and New Vestroia from Zenoheld, Spectra and their Vexos minions.
results.name: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Defenders of the Core

results.deck: Data-Fly Sci-Fi adventure stealth game that puts the player in the role of an AI named FLY who is on a mission to rescue her creator.
results.name: Data-Fly

results.deck: An action game set in post-apocalyptic Japan where the human race has inexplicably disappeared, leaving wild animals to reclaim the planet.
results.name: Tokyo Jungle

results.deck: An action adventure game that involves solving puzzles, managing resources, claiming territories, and battling angry monsters.
results.name: Troll & Armor

results.deck: Hellion: Mystery of the Inquisition is a first person shoot set in the 13th century.
results.name: Hellion: Mystery of the Inquisition

results.deck: Insect Armageddon is the fourth installment of D3's line of budget-priced shooters featuring online and local co-op modes, and a new Swarm survival mode.
results.name: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon

results.deck: Ghetto Golf combines golfing with machine guns. Your skills quickly grow as you bounce golf balls off of buildings and homeless people.
results.name: Ghetto Golf

results.deck: Application for PS3 that allows ad-hoc enabled PSP games to communicate to each other over the internet. In other words, it turns ad-hoc games into online games.
results.name: adhoc Party for Playstation Portable

results.deck: Telltale Games brings an all new adventure to the Back to the Future universe, which takes place six months after the end of the last film.
results.name: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 1: It's About Time

results.deck: The fourth entry in 2K Sports' Top Spin series released in March 2011. This edition brings new features such as PlayStation Move & 3D support.
results.name: Top Spin 4

results.deck: Dance! It's your Stage is a pop-themed rhythm game taking many cues from the Dance Dance Revolution Series. It was released through retail chains for PS3, PC, Wii and Nintendo DS and was later ported to the Xbox Live Arcade.
results.name: Dance! It's your Stage

results.deck: A post-apocalyptic gladiator arena filled with zombies with attitudes and armored war machines sets the stage in Blood Drive.
results.name: Blood Drive

results.deck: A new entry in THQ's MX vs. ATV series. It is not a squad-based, class-based, tactical stealth action game.
results.name: MX vs. ATV Alive

results.deck: UFC Personal Trainer aims to train players by using a variety of training techniques utilized by UFC superstars. The game will take advantage of the Kinect and PlayStation Move accessories.
results.name: UFC Personal Trainer

results.deck: Zettai Zetsumei Toshi 4: Summer Memories was to be the fourth game in the series and the first on the PS3. It was cancelled in March of 2011 after a devastating earthquake and tsunami struck Japan.
results.name: Zettai Zetsumei Toshi 4: Summer Memories

results.deck: As demon hunter Garcia "F**king" Hotspur, players must venture into Hell itself in order to rescue Paula, Garcia's innocent girlfriend, from the sadistic torments of Fleming, the Lord of Demons.
results.name: Shadows of the Damned

results.deck: Capcom's Devil May Cry series gets a stylish new reboot from developer Ninja Theory, featuring a redesigned Dante and a new take on the franchise's fiction.
results.name: DmC Devil May Cry

results.deck: Ninja Gaiden 3 is the first main entry in the modern Ninja Gaiden series not to be directed by former Team Ninja head Tomonobu Itagaki. NG3 features new game mechanics, a focus on consequence and 8-player online modes.
results.name: Ninja Gaiden 3

results.deck: Asura's Wrath is an interactive anime action title that tells the tale of violent demigod Asura on a quest for vengeance against the cabal of gods that betrayed him.
results.name: Asura's Wrath

results.deck: A re-release of two classic Team Ico games that feature HD graphics & stereoscopic 3D support. Features originally found only in the Japanese and PAL versions of the games (co-op play in Ico, for example) are included in the North American release for the first time.
results.name: The Ico & Shadow of the Colossus Collection

results.deck: A quasi-sequel to From Software's action-RPG Demon's Souls, set in a new universe while retaining most of the basic gameplay and the high level of challenge. It features a less-linear world, a new checkpoint system in the form of bonfires, and the unique Humanity system.
results.name: Dark Souls

results.deck: Disgaea 4 continues the epic saga of the Netherworld. The game boasts major graphical improvements, a slew of new characters, as well as improved gameplay mechanics to provide the ultimate next-gen Disgaea experience.
results.name: Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten

results.deck: An on-rails shooter in which the player fights schoolgirls by shooting pheromones at them. Developed by Inti Creates for the 360 and PS3. Jeff Gerstmann approved.
results.name: Gal Gun

results.deck: Tekken's spin-off tag-team fighting game returns with a whopping 59 fighters from the series' history (all the way to Tekken 6).
results.name: Tekken Tag Tournament 2

results.deck: The feudal Chinese factions of Wu, Shu, and Wei (along with the new Jin Kingdom) return for another installment of tactical action and K.O. counts into the thousands!
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 7

results.deck: Enhanced port by Aquaplus of the Leaf eroge from 1998. Nothing is known about the plot, apparently.
results.name: White Album: Tsuzurareru Fuyu no Omoide

results.deck: HD remaster of the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time trilogy. Contains The Sands of Time, Warrior Within, and The Two Thrones.
results.name: Prince of Persia Trilogy

results.deck: The first game in the popular racing franchise after the EA/NASCAR fallout. Developed by Eutechnyx.
results.name: NASCAR 2011: The Game

results.deck: An RTS based on the Hundred Years' War.
results.name: The History Channel: Great Battles - Medieval

results.deck: SingStar game featuring one of Sweden's biggest pop bands, Kent.
results.name: SingStar Kent

results.deck: The third title in Koei's series of Dynasty Warriors-style gameplay set in the Gundam universe, boasting cel-shaded graphics and four-player online co-operative multiplayer.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 3

results.deck: Tying in to the 2011 film Captain America: The First Avenger, Super Soldier tells a side-story where the ultra-patriotic Steve Rogers takes the fight to the villainous HYDRA organization during World War II.
results.name: Captain America: Super Soldier

results.deck: X-Men RPG featuring a branching storyline which puts you in the shoes of a rookie X-Man, written by Mike Carey, who also wrote the X-Men: Legacy comic books.
results.name: X-Men: Destiny

results.deck: A hostess-club/dating simulator from the developer of Dream C Club, D3 Publisher Inc.
results.name: Dream C Club Zero

results.deck: Pick up a Rock Band or Guitar Hero guitar to play along with the standard karaoke gameplay that the SingStar franchise is known for.
results.name: Singstar Guitar

results.deck: The second console entry in the Rune Factory franchise, Tides of Destiny has a strong nautical theme, with sea travel and islands being a major focus.
results.name: Rune Factory: Tides of Destiny

results.deck: A Singstar game created for Finnish audience.
results.name: Singstar SuomiHitit

results.deck: The third installment in the series sees a reluctant victim battling nature, pirates, and the island's insanity-inducing jungle to rescue his friends and family from an island paradise gone horribly wrong.
results.name: Far Cry 3

results.deck: The first Suzumiya Haruhi adventure game for a next-gen machine. Announced for the PS3 and PSP to be released in 2011. The original story takes place directly following the recently released Suzumiya Haruhi movie.
results.name: Suzumiya Haruihi no Tsuisou

results.deck: On an expedition to find the mythical "Atlantis of the Sands" in the heart of the Arabian Desert, Nathan Drake and his partner, Victor Sullivan, encounter a deceptive organization led by a ruthless dictator. Terrible secrets unfold, causing Drake's quest to descend into a bid for survival.
results.name: Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception

results.deck: Follow the exploits of Captain Cole Anderson as he tries to stop a bio-weapon being unleashed.
results.name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2

results.deck: The fourth game in the Way of the Samurai series.
results.name: Way of the Samurai 4

results.deck: The latest CSI game to be released for PC, Wii, 360 & PS3.  The game coincides with the 10th season of the hit TV show.
results.name: CSI: Fatal Conspiracy

results.deck: The third main installment in the match-three franchise.
results.name: Bejeweled 3

results.deck: The second pack of country songs feature 21 never-before-available tracks from Johnny Cash, Lady Antebellum, Rascal Flats, and more.  Songs will be exportable to Rock Band 3 and previous titles.
results.name: Rock Band Country Track Pack 2

results.deck: An action-adventure game based on the Gore Verbinski/Johnny Depp animated movie of the same name.
results.name: Rango: The Video Game

results.deck: A first person parkour game by EA in collaboration with Steven Spielberg that has been cancelled twice.
results.name: LMNO

results.deck: Two Crusaders fight armies of enemies in order to free their souls of a sinister curse in this upcoming action game from Kylotonn.
results.name: The Cursed Crusade

results.deck: The sequel to the original "reboot" of the TOCA Race Driver series, GRID (known as Racedriver: GRID outside of the US). It uses the same EGO 3.0 Engine which was used in Dirt 3 and employs a brand new system called "TrueFeel" which provides a balance between accessibility and realism.
results.name: GRID 2

results.deck: Buzz! Junior: Dino Den is a PS2 game that uses the Buzz! controllers. Up to 4 players can compete in Dinosaur related mini-games.
results.name: Buzz! Junior: Dino Den

results.deck: The fourth game in the Disney Sing It! video game series. Much like its predecessors, the game is like every other singing game you've played, but with a Disney twist.
results.name: Disney Sing It: Party Hits

results.deck: The sequel to Piranha Bytes' action-RPG Risen. This time, there be pirates.
results.name: Risen 2: Dark Waters

results.deck: A port of Samurai Warriors 3 and Samurai Warriors 3: Xtreme Legends to Sony sytems. The game includes all of the content of the original Wii title and its expansion except for Murasame Castle.
results.name: Sengoku Musou 3Z

results.deck: Major League Baseball 2K11 is Visual Concepts iteration of the MLB franchise for the 2011 MLB season and features the Dynamic Player Rating system that updates player ratings on recent real-world performance.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K11

results.deck: Developed by Sidhe, the game includes all New Zealand leagues of Rugby, online multiplayer and extensive customisation options.
results.name: Rugby Challenge

results.deck: A popular Visual Novel by Akabei Soft2
results.name: Sharin no Kuni, Himawari no Shōjo

results.deck: 28 tracks appear in this European singing game.
results.name: The X Factor

results.deck: The game follows the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow and others from the movies. The title features characters and scenarios from all four films: The Curse of the Black Pearl, The Dead Man's Chest, At World's End and On Stranger Tides
results.name: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game

results.deck: A downloadable adventure puzzle game by Double Fine, set in a 1930s environment, where players control the world's smallest Matryoshka doll.
results.name: Stacking

results.deck: A group of international soldiers take on an army of rogue androids in this sci-fi shooter set in 2080's Tokyo.
results.name: Binary Domain

results.deck: This UK-based release lets you toss darts at targets. Darts targets.
results.name: PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour

results.deck: A story-driven flight combat game set in World War II.
results.name: Air Conflicts: Secret Wars

results.deck: The sequel to Radical Entertainment's 2009 ultra-violent sandbox game, Prototype 2 returns to an urban landscape ravaged by an all-consuming virus.
results.name: Prototype 2

results.deck: A role-playing game for the PlayStation 3 by Level-5 and animation studio Studio Ghibli.
results.name: Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch

results.deck: The sixth entry in the Snowboard Super X series that allows players to ride down real world mountains in dangerous weather conditions.
results.name: SSX

results.deck: The fifth installment in Bethesda's Elder Scrolls franchise is set in the eponymous province of Skyrim, where the ancient threat of dragons, led by the sinister Alduin, is rising again to threaten all mortal races. Only the player, as the prophesied hero the Dovahkiin, can save the world from destruction.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
